channel.title: The Amazing Spider-Man on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in The Amazing Spider-Man on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Emma Stone Remembers ‘The Amazing Spider-Man’ Films as “a Really Special Time in My Life”
item.description: The two-time Oscar winner starred in both the Andrew Garfield-led movies as Gwen Stacy, Peter Parker’s love interest, in 2012 and 2014.
